EmailTemplate.name: Cash Pickle Lead Greeting
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You For Contacting Cash Pickle!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Great News {!Lead.FirstName}!
You are pre-qualified for a Cash Pickle Merchant Cash Advance! We have already started the advance process and will contacting you shortly to discuss your total advance amount, eligibility and terms.
For even faster service, call us right now at 1-877-889-1037.
You made a great choice contacting Cash Pickle and we look forward to getting you the cash you need, right now.
Sincerely,
{!Lead.OwnerFirstName}
The Cash Pickle Team "Don't Get Swiped!"TM
